entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Saint-Jérôme
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Montréal-Mirabel Int'l Airport 10:40 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 43 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
